public_or_brief_title: The identification of risk factors for cardiovascular disease in koreans and development of prospective trials to validate the efficacy of risk modification for the prevention of cardiovascular disease
scientific_title: Randomized, multicenter, open-labeled, two-arm parallel group trial of pitavastatin 2 mg OD for reducing the risk of major cardiovascular events in patients with clustering cardiovascular risk factors

lay_summary: - The prevalence of cardiovascular disease is increasing very rapidly and the prevalence of diabetes and metabolic syndrome, as risk for the cardiovascular disease, are increasing, too. However, it has never been proved whether statins show the benefit on the prevention of cardiovascular disease to the Korean population. The purpose of current study is to prove if long-term trial of statin may exert the preventive effect on the Korean subjects with diabetes and other multiple risk factors including metabolic syndrome, whose serum total cholesterol levels are 220 mg/dl or less.
intervention_description: Administration of pitavastatin 2 mg one tablet, once a day in the morning or non-medication - Follow-up for 60 months after LPI,

inclusion_criteria.description: 1. Acquisition of consent form 2. Total cholesterol level of less than 220mg/dl Should have at least one of categories listed in the item 3. or 4. 3. Clearly diagnosed as diabetes and should have at least two of those listed as follows; -  Age ; male 45YO or more, female 55YO or more -  Current smoker -  Diagnosed as hypertension -  Low HDL cholesterol levels \u0026lt;40 mg/dl -  Abdominal obesity (male; 90 cm or more, female; 85 cm or more of waist circumferences) 4. Non-diabetics, but calculated 10-year-risk for cardiovascular disease (offered by NCEP-III guideline) equals or more than 20 % and diagnosed as metabolic syndrome.
